text: Bronson Cutting La Follette (February 2, 1936 - March 15, 2018) was an American Democratic lawyer and politician. He was the 36th and 39th Attorney General of the state of Wisconsin. He was an unsuccessful candidate for Governor of Wisconsin in 1968. La Follette died on March 15, 2018 at the age of 82 at a hospital in Madison, Wisconsin.Bronson C. La Follette-death notice"Former Wisconsin Attorney General Bronson La Follette dies".
